features.weatherDescription: Thola izibikezelo ezinembile zesimo sezulu epulazini lakho

onboarding.locationDescription: Yabelana ngendawo yakho ukuze uthole izibikezelo zesimo sezulu ezinembile nezeluleko zokulima zasendaweni yakho.
onboarding.locationError: Ayikwazanga ukuthola indawo. Sicela uzame futhi.

history.title: Izingxoxo
history.noConversationsHint: Qala ingxoxo entsha ukuze uthole iseluleko sokulima.

settings.title: Izilungiselelo
settings.aiServicesSubtitle: Buka izinsizakalo ze-AI ezisebenzayo esifundeni sakho
settings.locationUpdateFailed: Ayikwazanga ukubuyekeza indawo. Sicela uzame futhi.
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Lokhu kuzoqala kabusha inqubo yesingeniso. Qhubeka?

mcp.title: Izinsizakalo ze-AI
mcp.servicesAvailable: Izinsizakalo eziyi-{active} kweziyi-{total} zitholakala endaweni yakho

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.description: Hlaziya izithombe zezitshalo ukuze uthole izifo, izinambuzane, kanye nokuntuleka kwezakhamzimba. Thola ukuhlolwa okusheshayo nezincomo zokwelapha namasu okuvikela.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Umhlabathi
isdaSoil.description: Thola ulwazi oluningiliziwe ngomhlabathi oluhlanganisa i-pH, i-nitrogen, i-phosphorus, i-potassium, nezinye izakhamzimba. Ihlanganisa yonke i-Afrika ngokucaca kwamamitha angama-30.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Izimo zamanje nezibikezelo zezulu emhlabeni jikelele
accuweather.description: Finyelela idatha yesimo sezulu ngesikhathi sangempela okuhlanganisa izinga lokushisa, umswakama, isivinini somoya, nemvula. Izibikezelo zitholakala kuze kube yizinsuku eziyi-15.

gapWeather.name: GAP Isimo Sezulu
gapWeather.description: Izibikezelo zezulu ezikhethekile zezolimo eKenya. Kuhlanganisa ukuhwamuka kwamanzi, imisebe yelanga, nezibikezelo zemvula ezenzelwe izinqumo zokulima.

edacap.name: EDACaP Isimo Sezulu
edacap.description: Izibikezelo zezulu zezikhathi zonyaka ezihlanganisa izinga lokushisa nezibikezelo zemvula. Kusiza abalimi ukuhlela izikhathi zokutshala nokuvuna.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Idatha yesimo sezulu yezindawo zomhlaba wonke
weatherapi.description: Inzizakalo yedatha yesimo sezulu ebanzi enikeza izimo zamanje nezibikezelo zezindawo zomhlaba wonke.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Inkundla ethuthukile yolwazi lwesimo sezulu enezibikezelo ezinemba kakhulu kanye namakhono okubikezela okusheshayo.

feedFormulation.name: Ukuhlanganisa Ukudla
feedFormulation.tagline: Izibalo zokudla okuhle kakhulu kwezinkomo zobisi
feedFormulation.description: Bala ukudla okuxutshiwe okonga kakhulu kwezinkomo zakho zobisi. Kubheka imigomo yokukhiqiza ubisi, isisindo somzimba, nokudla okutholakala endaweni.

nextgen.name: Umfundisi weSizukulwane Esisha
nextgen.description: Thola izincomo zomfundisi ezinembile ngokusekelwe endaweni yakho eqondile. Kuhlanganisa izincomo zomfundisi wemvelo (umquba, umquba wezimpethu) kanye nowokwenziwa (i-Urea, i-NPS).

decisionTree.name: Umgwamanda Wezinqumo Zesitshalo
decisionTree.description: Thola izincomo zokuphathwa kwezitshalo ngokusekelwe esigabeni sokukhula nasezimeni zezulu zamanje. Kukusiza ukwenza izinqumo ezifanele zokulawula izinambuzane, ukuchelela, nokuvuna.

gapAgriculture.name: GAP Ezolimo
gapAgriculture.description: Izinsizakalo zokweluleka ngezolimo ezijwayelekile zokuphathwa kwezitshalo nezifuyo.

errors.syncFailed: Ayikwazanga ukuxhuma kuseva. Ezinye izici zingase zinganelwe.
errors.weatherUnavailable: Isevisi yesimo sezulu ayitholakali okwesikhashana. Zama futhi kamuva.
errors.diagnosisTimeout: Ukuhlonza isitshalo kuthatha isikhathi eside. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.uploadFailed: Ayikwazanga ukulayisha isithombe. Hlola uxhumano lwakho bese uzama futhi.
errors.transcriptionFailed: Ukubhalwa kwezwi kwehlulekile. Zama ukukhuluma futhi.
errors.serverError: Iphutha leseva. Sicela uzame futhi kamuva.
errors.requestTimeout: Isicelo siphelelwe isikhathi. Hlola uxhumano lwakho.
